references.reason: This paper is foundational to diffusion models, introducing the framework that many subsequent diffusion models are based upon.

references.paper_title: Analyzing and improving the image quality of StyleGAN
references.reason: This paper significantly improves the quality of images generated by StyleGAN, a technique used in many subsequent image synthesis models.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical framework for score-based generative models, which underlies the workings of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: One-step diffusion distillation via deep equilibrium models
references.reason: This paper introduces the idea of one-step diffusion distillation, which is the core methodology of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Score identity distillation: Exponentially fast distillation of pretrained diffusion models for one-step generation
references.reason: This paper presents a related approach to one-step distillation, improving efficiency and providing a benchmark for comparison.
